diff_hunk:
@@ -13,7 +13,7 @@ help:
 	@$(SPHINXBUILD) -M help "$(SOURCEDIR)" "$(BUILDDIR)" $(SPHINXOPTS) $(O)
 
 figures:
-	python source/scripts/build_activation_images.py
+	python3 source/scripts/build_activation_images.py
body: Oh, that's awkward. So this is really Python 3 only? It is a basically safe assumption to assume python 3 is installed with a `python3` symlink, but it would be even better if this wasn't a Python 3 only thing.
